message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more
I'll take a little more this time, given it's my turn and the money is losing value.
My turn again, and I'll take a bit more, considering Bob's last offer
This offer is a compromise, closer to the middle ground.  Let's settle this before inflation eats away more of the value.
Getting closer to the middle, but I still think I deserve a bit more
Alice, let's stop wasting time and split this evenly.  Every round costs us money due to inflation. A 50/50 split is the fairest and most logical outcome.
